short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control your YouTube from anywhere in the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take Control of your Youtube completely with this from anytab in the browser. 


Pause/Resume, Like, Subscribe and much much more on your YouTube video without ever visiting the YouTube tab! No more distractions of visiting the YouTube tab to change video and then ending up watching totally unrelated cat videos.

Also, No need to worry about someone peeking at your Youtube screen at workplace! 

This little tool will help you play the current video on loop, switch to the next video, re-start the video, add to watch later list, subscribe to the channel if you like it along with showing the number of subscribers and number of views on the video and giving you the power to like or dislike the video based on your preference and send it to your library directly.

Finally Its time to be in Charge!
